reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress fits well, with one mentioning it covers long arms, and they describe it as beautiful, flattering, and stretchy.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits perfectly
items.body: Love this dress. Iâ€™m a tall girl so it was long and came down past my feet which I love. The sleeves were long as well and they covered my long arms which came to my fingers. I would buy all the colors I am very satisfied with this dress. Itâ€™s not everyday a tall girl can find a dress thatâ€™s longer than her. â¤ï¸ Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress for a great night
items.body: Great quality of dress. You get exactly what you see, very flattering and I got tons of compliments. The dress has stretch, it doesn't wrinkle and if you need to do a last minute hem it does not fray. Read more
items.author: Krystle

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars large= sz.6/8
items.body: brown is a deep taupe-cocoa. I usually wear large on average - in dresses with stretch. This dress in Large (usually like a 10/12) fits like a Small/Medium (6/8). Especially snug on top (arms/chest) for my shape. 5â€™5â€ hourglass shape/ 38B bra / 196 lbs Nice super long length. Ruched @ lower belly area and below. You could wear it backwards too and emphasize your butt cheeks while keeping the front smooth.* * But there is a seam on the back (above the waist) that when turning the dress around to wear backwards will give the smooth side an empire waist. Read more
items.author: Jen/Matt

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Poor quality
items.body: The quality of this dress disappointed me for the price. Fit was awkward but sizing is true to size. Returned this and definitely would not buy again Read more
items.author: Alexis

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Recommend
items.body: A very beautiful dress, my daughter wore it to a wedding. Read more

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Ruched Bodycon Long Sleeve Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Ruched Bodycon Long Sleeve Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Brown, Black, Green, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
